channel.title: google scholar on 苏命 | Ming Su
channel.description: Recent content in google scholar on 苏命 | Ming Su

item.title: The solution for Google searching in mainland China
item.description: I have recently found a good solution for searching with google. It is not based on vpn nor host file. Just simply use http://www.gfsoso.com for google main sites and use http://www.gfsoso.com/scholar for google scholar, and so on. Good luck!
